    • Method Detail

      • build

        ProxySettings build()
        Builds the.
        Returns:
        New instance of ProxySettings.

      • withConnectionType

        ProxySettingsBuilder withConnectionType(ConnectionType connectionType)
        With connection type.
        Parameters:
        connectionType - The ConnectionType.
        Warning: All other settings are ignored if type is not equals ConnectionType.CustomProxy.
        Returns:
        The ProxySettingsBuilder for chaining.

      • withProxyAuthentification

        ProxySettingsBuilder withProxyAuthentification(boolean isProxyAuthentification)
        Parameters:
        isProxyAuthentification - If true: use withProxyUser(User) for authentication.
        Returns:
        The ProxySettingsBuilder for chaining.

      • withProxyServerAddress

        ProxySettingsBuilder withProxyServerAddress(String proxyServerAddress)
        Parameters:
        proxyServerAddress - The proxy server address.
        Returns:
        The ProxySettingsBuilder for chaining.

      • withProxyServerPort

        ProxySettingsBuilder withProxyServerPort(int port)
        Parameters:
        port - The port of the proxy server.
        Returns:
        The ProxySettingsBuilder for chaining.

      • withProxyUser

        ProxySettingsBuilder withProxyUser(User user)
        Parameters:
        user - The User for authentication.
        Note: You also have to enable withProxyAuthentification(boolean).
        Returns:
        The ProxySettingsBuilder for chaining.
